name: Arborgore
description:
A short roguelite about jumping down levels of a forest.

Hope you enjoy it!

Note: When you get to the rest cabin at the end, the game will end once you enter the door. This is not a bug. I'm just not good at ending things. ԅ[ •́ ﹏ •̀ ]و

ver 1.1.3 updates:

  • added health bars to enemies
  • colored important parts of update messages in-game
  • can now use Z and X keys to use objects and advance text respectively
  • increased dialogue text size
  • player's current level is now displayed more consistently
  • added critical attacks
  • added vim movement controls (HJKL)
  • now if you die the your stats are correctly reset
  • move with WASD or arrow keys or vim keys (HJKL)
  • pickup items with the spacebar
  • just bump into things to attack or interact with them
  • advance text with the enter key
